results.query: What ayah discusses those who were given a portion of the Scripture and choose error over guidance?
What ayah illustrates the behavior of those who possess a portion of the Scripture yet choose to pursue error instead?
What ayah can help someone understand the motivations behind why certain individuals choose to mislead others despite having received divine guidance?
What ayah analyzes the motivations behind those who distort the truth and seek to mislead others?
What ayah serves as a critical reflection on the behavior of those who possess knowledge yet choose to mislead others?
What ayah discusses the hardening of hearts and the influence of Satan during the time of punishment?
What ayah reflects on the consequences of not humbling oneself in the face of divine punishment?
What ayah illustrates the consequences of hardening one's heart in the face of divine punishment?
What ayah analyzes the reasons behind the hardening of hearts in response to divine punishment?
What ayah critically examines the reasons behind the lack of humility in the face of divine punishment?
What ayah expresses the reliance on Allah and a plea not to be a trial for the wrongdoing people?
What ayah expresses the reliance on Allah and the plea to not be a trial for the wrongdoing people?
What ayah can be referenced when seeking guidance on relying on Allah during trials and asking for protection from being a test for the wrongdoers?
What ayah analyzes the plea for divine protection from becoming a trial for the wrongdoers?
What ayah serves as a critical reflection on reliance upon Allah and the plea to avoid being a trial for the wrongdoers?
